borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The proposed&nbsp;first floor side extension by reason of its sitting, depth, scale, massing, and bulk would negatively affect the privacy of its neighbours living at&nbsp;114 Oxlow Lane.&nbsp;The proposal is therefore contrary to:</p><ul><li>Paragraph 135(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework (December&nbsp;2023)</li><li>Policies D6 of the London Plan (March 2021)</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li><li>Paragraph 4.2 of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul>

<p style="">The proposed&nbsp;first floor side extension by reason of its&nbsp;scale, siting and design would close the gap between the buildings and it would cause&nbsp;harm&nbsp;to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</p><div><ul><li>Paragraphs 131, 135, 139, and 209&nbsp;of the National Planning Policy Framework (December&nbsp;2023)</li><li>Policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021)</li><li>Policies CP2 and CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li><li>Paragraph&nbsp;5.4.1 and&nbsp;5.4.2&nbsp;of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul></div>
description: Construction of a first floor side extension with a hipped roof
